page.title: 20Law and order.
page.content: We have a local policeman who is based at Hedon and he usually drives around the area in his police car.He will sometimes walk around and he knows most of the families and the children. The parish council are responsible for most of the general order of things such as roads and drains and street lights. The roads are nearly always in a mess because of the flooding and the heavy lorries and farm vehicles that use them. The parish council are responsible to Skirlaugh County Council for making sure that things run smoothly.At the moment a new tidal barrier is being built due to the council and street lights were put up last year. Most of the vandalism is caused by children coming to the area from Hull or Hedon or Thorngumbald.
